summary: Mesh fix for "Real Roads for Skyrim" created by MrTroubleMaker.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][color=#ffff00][b]Description[/b][/color]
This file is a mesh fix for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55518]Real Roads for Skyrim[/url] created by MrTroubleMaker.
dweroadscurver01.nif from Real Roads(v1.01) makes Dwemer ruins road have weird [color=#00ff00][b]green[/b][/color] color.

[color=#ffff00][b]Installation
[/b][/color]Simply install with mod manager as a usual mod.
Alternatively, You also can add it to Real Roads zip file and install if you want to keep your mod list looks clean.

[color=#ff7700][b]NOTE[/b][/color]: For Skyrim SE user, Download file from optional file section.(converted by SSE NIF Optimizer v2.5)
Read [url=https://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1866500-real-roads-for-skyrim/?p=44523525]this post [/url]if you don't know how to port Real Roads for SSE.
(In short, Just resave .esp in CK SSE and convert meshes with SSE NIF Optimizer.)

[b][color=#ffff00]Credit[/color][/b]
Original post: [url=https://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1866500-real-roads-for-skyrim/?p=29673945]https://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1866500-real-roads-for-skyrim/?p=29673945[/url]
File permission was given from MrTroubleMaker.
[color=#ffff00]
[/color][/size]
author: MrTroubleMaker
